name: Advanced Retirement Planner
description: Professional-grade retirement planning with critical UI fixes and CORS-free operation
author: Yali Pollak (יהלי פולק)
features: Permanent side panel with tabbed navigation
Enhanced chart breakdowns showing all savings components
RSU stock price integration for 60+ companies
majorChanges: NEW: Permanent side panel with always-visible controls
NEW: Tabbed navigation system (Overview, Savings, Investments, Scenarios, Settings)
ENHANCED: Chart now shows stacked area breakdown of all savings components
NEW: Multi-currency selector in header with real-time conversion
NEW: Comprehensive UI test suite for design validation
IMPROVED: User experience with persistent side panel
